page.home.banner.content: Panda loves crypto trading and welcomes crypto lovers to try Option Panda out.
page.home.userCase.buyer.title: Option Buyer
page.home.userCase.buyer.content: Buy a Call/Put option with your favorite expiry duration, and enjoy the leveraged profit from an asset's price up/down
page.home.userCase.poller.title: Option Seller
page.home.userCase.poller.content: Join the option underwriting pool by depositing asset to share option fee revenue
page.home.trading.tips.buy1: Click the "Buy" button and confirm the transaction for spending
page.home.trading.tips.buy2: in your wallet to purchase your selected option.
page.home.qa.item1.title: What is Option Panda?
page.home.qa.item1.content: Option Panda is a decentralized options underwriting & trading exchange, which supports Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain etc. Its similar peers are Hegic and Binance Option, semi-decentralized and centralized in nature respectively. If you’re not familiar with option and its benefit, try learn some basics from here.
page.home.qa.item2.title: What is the roadmap of Option Panda?
page.home.qa.item2.content:
At its initial launch, Option Panda will focus on providing traditional cryptocurrency (BTCB/ETH/BNB etc.) option trading on Binance Smart Chain, with gradual listing of more underlying assets. In 2021, we’ll add CBBC(Callable Bull/Bear Contracts), which is a variant of options, to expand the product line.

It’s also a work in progress to support Ethereum Optimistic Rollup network, Algorand etc., for users of those public chains to trade options. Integration and combination with other decentralized asset trading platforms or protocols are also under rigorous consideration. Option Panda is gonna evolve to a composable exotic derivatives trading platform. We will listen to the community’s opinion and let the community vote to decide the future direction of Option Panda.
page.sell.banner.title: Join the liquidity pool to underwrite options
page.sell.banner.content:
Provide asset to either a Call or Put Underwriting Pool;
Auto-accumulate option premiums from option buyers;
Your fund is SAFE, all pools are non-custodial.
page.sell.pooler.coin.desc.BTCB: Provide BTCB/USDT to join a pooled underwriting for BTCB Call/Put options
page.sell.pooler.coin.desc.ETH: Provide ETH/USDT to join a pooled underwriting for ETH Call/Put options
page.sell.pooler.coin.desc.BNB: Provide BNB/USDT to join a pooled underwriting for BNB Call/Put options
page.sell.pooler.tips.deposit1: Click the “DEPOSIT” button and confirm the transaction for spending
page.sell.pooler.tips.deposit2: in your wallet to replenish the option underwriting pool. After the transaction is successful, you'll join the underwriting syndicate to share the option fee income.
page.sell.pooler.income.claim: After claiming premium, your investment will stay in the pool to share prospective income.
